Services

AI in Agriculture Training, Speaking & Advisory

Innovation with a human heartbeat — grounded in real agrifood systems. I work with leaders, educators, and innovators to make AI practical, responsible, and useful: in classrooms, boardrooms, and policy rooms.

What I do

Packages

Choose a package (or we tailor one)

These are designed to be simple to book and easy to say “yes” to. If you’re not sure which fits — pick the closest and we’ll refine it on a short call.

AI in Agriculture Executive Briefing (90 minutes)

For leadership teams who need clarity fast — what AI can do, what it can’t, and what to do next.

  • Pre-call + tailored briefing
  • Q&A and decision framing
  • 1-page recap with recommended next steps
Book this briefing →

Half-Day Workshop: Practical AI Adoption (3–4 hours)

Turn interest into an actionable plan: use-cases, constraints, data, governance, and pilots.

  • Interactive exercises + team alignment
  • Prioritised use-case shortlist
  • 90-day action plan
Plan a workshop →

Training Sprint: AI Literacy for Agrifood (4–6 weeks)

Build internal capability with a structured learning pathway your team actually completes.

  • Weekly sessions + practical homework
  • Office hours
  • Final roadmap + learning assets
Start a sprint →

Policy Brief + Stakeholder Session (2–3 weeks)

Evidence synthesis + facilitation to align stakeholders and design policy-ready actions.

  • Short policy brief (clear, decision-ready)
  • Stakeholder workshop facilitation
  • Options, trade-offs, evaluation approach
Request a policy package →

Women in Agriculture Programme Design (Project-based)

Design a cohort programme that produces outcomes — not just inspiration.

  • Cohort structure + curriculum
  • Mentoring model + measurable milestones
  • Facilitation plan + communications toolkit
Design a programme →

Pricing: shared on request — because scope, audience size, and delivery format matter.

Process

How we work (simple, calm, effective)

1) A short scoping call

We clarify audience, constraints, and outcomes. No long forms. No fluff.

2) A tailored plan

I design the session and deliverables to match your reality — time, data, and decision needs.

3) Delivery + next steps

You leave with clarity and momentum: slides, recap, and a practical “what now” path.
